articles.title: Mulvaney: 14th Amendment ‘doesn’t really solve the problem’
articles.description: Former Trump White House budget chief Mick Mulvaney said Monday that invoking the 14th Amendment to avert a federal default would do more harm than good. articles.title: Donald Trump faces further lawsuit over remarks on CNN
articles.description: Lawyers said former president ‘doubled down’ on derogatory remarks the day after verdict announced in earlier case.
articles.content:
The columnist who won a sexual abuse and defamation case against former US president Donald Trump has filed a fresh lawsuit over comments he made on TV a day after the verdict was announced.

articles.author: Yahoo News
articles.title: E. Jean Carroll Sues Trump Again Over CNN Comments for 'Very Substantial' Amount of Money
articles.description: The day after a jury found former president Donald Trump liable for defaming and sexually abusing E. Jean Carroll, awarding her $5 million in damages, Trump mocked her on air during a CNN town hall. That turned out to be a pretty stupid move, as Carroll has now filed a new defamation suit against Trump that’s asking for a quite a bit more money, per the New York Times.
